name: Runes Challenge
description:
It is a casual game for mobile devices.

After playing the game, please tell me your opinion about the features found in it, answering the form:

FORM LINK

The game contains 30 challenges in the current version.

Each challenge has its own style, with variation of colors and symbols in the runes and each scenario has a unique layout.

The objective of the game is to hit all the pieces of the challenge without making mistakes.

The game progresses according to the player's level of accuracy in the challenges, the more challenges the player completes perfectly, the more challenges will be activated in the campaign.

Soon it will also be available on Google Play.
